name: Aevi
description:
This is the prototype of a fast-paced action-rpg roguelike. There isn't much content for now (two enemies and a boss) and the gameplay is somewhat limited (dodge & attack only) but it's a start. Forgive the "art", I can't draw.

Current plan is to add some more enemies and bosses before trying to determine what kind of skill and progression systems I'd like to add to improve the gameplay.

The game can be played with a mouse/keyboard or a controller.
